meanings.definition: Excessively bright or flashy in a tasteless way.
meanings.sent1: The garishness decorations at the party hurt my eyes.
meanings.sent2: Her garishness outfit stood out in the crowd.
meanings.sent3: The garishness of the neon sign made me chuckle.
meanings.sent4: The garishness of the painting screamed for attention.
meanings.sent5: The garishness colors clashed in an unpleasant manner.

meanings.definition: The quality of being showy or gaudy in a vulgar or tasteless way.
meanings.sent1: The garishness of the costume made everyone stare.
meanings.sent2: I couldn't ignore the garishness of the billboard.
meanings.sent3: The garishness of the cake made it hard to take seriously.
meanings.sent4: The garishness of the room overwhelmed my senses.
meanings.sent5: The garishness of the jewelry was impossible to miss.
